title: Comparing Distributions
question_text: Ms. Ortega gave an exam to both of her Calculus sections. The distribution of exam grades for both classes is shown below. Which of the following statements is not supported by the distributions?

choices.text: The Standard Deviation for Class A is larger than for Class B
The Variance for Class A is larger than for Class B.
Overall, Class B performed better on the exam.

More students in Class B earned scores of
75
than in Class A.
The Median for Class B is greater than the Median for Class A.
